name: LifeCam Cinema
info: This True 720p HD video camera brings colour, sharpness and digital sound to your vlogs and video calls.

name: LifeCam Hd-3000
info: True HD video camera that gives you bright and colourful video, and makes it easy to post to your favourite social sites.

name: LifeCam Studio
info: The LifeCam Studio webcam brings HD quality to your video chats and Skype calls.
